attributes.additional_details: Because as I stated this referee assistance dosent work and increases corruption with referees
attributes.background: To discuss the situation with var in the game of football as it ruins this sport and causes corruption in the world

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the use of VAR technology in football matches are a matter for the Football Association, not the UK Government or Parliament.
